subject: RE: Your ‪WP Perk Pty Ltd‬ receipt [#1347-8628]
preview: Hi Loly, Sure, ok, leave it with me. We will get this over to you shortly.

full_threads.body:
Hi Loly, 

Sure, ok, leave it with me. We will get this over to you shortly.

Hello All,

The reason why we need the invoice is for GST purposes. On the invoice it should state if the charges includes GST or not.

Hope this is clear.

Kind Regards,

Loly Gartner

ACCOUNTS & ADMIN ASSISTANT

P:

+61 8 8210 4000

admin@ramequipment.com.au

A:

181 Richmond Road, Richmond, SA 5033

Stay Connected

Hi Heath and Loly,

Note the attached came through to me yesterday.

Heath from accountings perspective a receipt is not the same as an invoice. What Loly needs is an invoice sent to her. She can probably tell you why that is required, I don't really know myself.

Kind Regards,

Jessica Torres

Hi Loly,


Just letting you know we have signed up with a web developer on a month to month basis to help with our website and maintenance.


This month we are looking at spending $1,000 - so they will send another invoice of this additional expense.


But then the month after that we will look to drop down to $499 or a $250 plan depending on our needs.


Kind Regards,

Jessica Torres
